name: Communities Reached
description: Tracks the number of communities engaged through training, workshops, or outreach programs.

name: Youth & Women Trained
description: Measures the number of youth and women trained in digital skills, sustainable farming, and entrepreneurship.

name: Solar Installations Completed
description: Tracks the total number of solar systems installed for households, schools, or farms.

name: Trees Planted & Survived
description: Measures the number of trees planted and those that survive after 12 months.

name: Website Visitors
description: Tracks the number of unique visitors accessing the JOMPO website.
